Data variables description:

subject: subject's serial number in the data set
subject_ID: subject's identification code in the experiment
session: 0 - sham right DLPFC, 1 - right DLPFC, 2 - left DLPFC
outcome1: upper outcome of the left lottery on the screen
outcome2: lower outcome of the left lottery on the screen
outcome3: upper outcome of the right lottery on the screen
outcome4: lower outcome of the right lottery on the screen
prob1: probability of the upper outcome
prob2: probability of the lower outcome
choice: 1 - subject chose left lottery, 2 - subject chose right lottery
rt: response time
Onsettime: onset time for the current trial
gender: 0 - female subject, 1 - male subject
session_order: serial number of the session within the subject
